item.description: Let's dine continental -without spending a fortune- at a genuine French-style bistro near Kenmore Square. All plats principaux are under $20. We will sit down at 19:00 but feel free to drop in at the bar after 18:30 for an aperitif and conversation. If you reply yes but can't make it, do change your RSVP to preserve good relations with the establishment.
item.how_to_find_us: Will be at the bar downstairs at 6:30 (I will be wearing an ascot)

group.name: The Boston Euro Social Meetup Group

item.name: Dinner at Petit Robert, Back Bay
